metadata.synopsis: | There is a house that is serving as a hostel for refugees. One of the refugees is mumbling something to himself, staring into the window. He is not happy because the streets are full of harbingers, flaming fists, steelwatchers and other refugees who create a lot of noise and he can't sleep. Probably he came from farm regions where all was peace and quiet before the Absolute and compared to the city |
metadata.how_to_trigger: Goto Refugee Hostel second floor. You can use goto 91 -63

0.speaker: Goris Ballast
0.text: It's safe enough here, but peaceful? Not even close.

1.speaker: Goris Ballast
1.text: Good luck getting some kip up here. I'd stuff your ears if I were you.
